rules_text:
Trample
[i]Dagdar's Man[/i] – When Marty enters, you may search your library for a card named Dagdar. If you do, reveal it then put it into your hand and shuffle.
[i]Fiana Freeblades[/i] – {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you control a creature named Dagdar, they also gain first strike until end of turn.
